thread.title: In our battles, you won most of them: Graeme Smith to Zaheer Khan
thread.title_full: In our battles, you won most of them: Graeme Smith to Zaheer Khan

author: Deccan
title: In our battles, you won most of them: Graeme Smith to Zaheer Khan
text:
Deccan Chronicle | October 16, 2015, 18.06 pm Former South Africa skipper Graeme Smith acknowledged the Indian spearhead a day after his retirement. (Photo: AFP) Mumbai: Zaheer Khan – one of the best Indian fast bowlers of all-time – called time on his international career on Thursday. The bowler, in his 15-year journey, troubled batsmen across the globe. Former South Africa skipper Graeme Smith is one of them.
The left-hander fell prey to Khan 14 times overall. The Zaheer v/s Smith battle was the one fans eagerly waited for, and on Friday, the gentleman South African congratulated the bowler. Smith accepted that Zaheer outdid him in most of the battles.
Congrats on a fantastic career @ImZaheer enjoyed our battles,even if you won most of them:)all the best for your future.you made India proud
— Graeme Smith (@GraemeSmith49) October 15, 2015 Be in India or South Africa, Smith could never understand Zaheer's trap for he was a master of reverse swing.
Khan retired with 311 wickets in 92 Tests, 282 in 200 ODIs.
 Cricket Zaheer Khan Graeme Smith India vs South Africa series Also Read India’s World Cup hero Zaheer Khan announces retirement from international cricket Dravid says Zaheer Khan should contemplate his future Ishant will have to bowl a lot of bouncers: Zaheer Khan Focus on Gauti, Zaheer as India squad to be announced tomorrow
